caption: Respond to a property possession claim
heading: Contact preference
content:
Important documents like orders will always be sent by post.

You can choose to receive updates about your case by post or email. For example, when a hearing has been scheduled or a document is ready to view online.

labels.question: How do you want to receive updates?

errors.contactByEmailOrPost: Select how you want to receive updates
errors.contactByEmailOrPost.email.invalid: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
